solution_line_template: The cut-away part of the pole is {shorter_percentage} * {original_length} = <<{shorter_percentage}*{original_length}={cut_away_length}>>{cut_away_length} meters long.
So the pole is left at the length of {original_length} - {cut_away_length} = <<{original_length}-{cut_away_length}={remaining_length}>>{remaining_length} meters.
